name: Roybapy.GitHub.io
body: ### WeatherKast A beautiful, fast and simple weather app for your Android device. - See stunning animation that match time of day and current condition. - Import your friends location directly from Facebook. - Check the current, hourly and daily forecast with a swipe. - Get all the details: wind, pressure, humidity, precipitation, sunrise, sunset, local time. - Add and watch all your favorite cities and destinations with no restriction. ### Download Get it from Google play or Amazon app store. ### Support or Contact Having questions or suggestions? Contact bapy@outlook.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
